TITLE: BLIND SPOT DETECTION
DESCRIPTION: Blind Spot Detection with Cross-Traffic Alert61 helps warn you of vehicles you might otherwise miss. The system uses radar in the rear quarter panels to identify a vehicle entering your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the sideview mirror. Cross-Traffic Alert also uses radar to detect vehicles approaching from either side when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or your driveway. If it detects a vehicle approaching from up to 15 yards away, it sends an audible warning, a visual display in the sideview mirror and a signal in the message center.

TITLE: REAR VIEW CAMERA WITH REAR CAMERA WASH
DESCRIPTION: The Rear View Camera takes the guesswork out of knowing what is behind your vehicle.61  Should the camera lens become dirty, cleaning it is as simple as activating the rear window windshield wash that simultaneously triggers the camera wash—making what’s behind you clear as day.

TITLE: LINCOLN+ALEXA*
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln Motor Company and Amazon have collaborated to bring many familiar in-home uses of Alexa to your Lincoln vehicle. By using Lincoln+Alexa via SYNC® 3 AppLink®,12 you can ask to hear news stories and play music, add things to your Amazon shopping list, update personal calendars and use voice controls to operate smart-home devices, including your garage door, thermostats, lighting and more. Click here to discover the full range of capabilities.

TITLE: TWIN-TURBOCHARGED 2.7L V6 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: Discover an impressive combination of power, efficiency and quietness. The available Twin-Turbocharged 2.7L V6 engine is ready for wherever the road takes you, delivering 335 horsepower and 380 lb.-ft. of torque*. In creating it, our engineers were mindful of fuel efficiency as well as sound, designing it to be remarkably quiet. The result? An EPA-estimated highway fuel economy rating of 25 mpg.**

TITLE: 2.0L TURBOCHARGED I-4 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: The 250 horsepower* Turbocharged I-4 2.0L engine uses three technologies—the boost of turbocharging, the precision of direct injection and the sophistication of twin independent variable camshaft timing (Ti-VCT). The result is an outstandingly smooth drive.

TITLE: 8-SPEED TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: More shift points make for a smoother drive. The Lincoln Nautilus features an 8-speed SelectShift® transmission to create a more elegant and effortless sensation when shifting gears.

TITLE: AUTO EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB) a standard feature of Lincoln Co-Pilot360™, can potentially help avoid or lessen the severity of a traffic accident. A vehicle with AEB supports the driver by helping to avoid or lessen the severity of front crashes with another vehicle in certain situations. By using radar and camera technology to scan the road ahead, if the system detects another vehicle, it can provide a collision warning and automatically apply the brakes if the driver has not taken corrective action.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE STEERING
DESCRIPTION: Simply stated, available adaptive steering adjusts how much the vehicle responds to the driver’s steering input in order to turn the front wheels. It works by analyzing vehicle speed and driver input. That information is used to automatically adjust the firmness of the steering wheel to produce smooth and precise steering. This system delivers an agile connected feel at high speeds and reduces driver input at low speeds. To create an even more tailored experience, drivers can choose their preferred steering setting from among Normal, Comfort and Sport modes.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL WITH STOP-AND-GO AND LANE CENTERING
DESCRIPTION:
Adaptive cruise control in the Lincoln Nautilus does much more than keep the vehicle traveling at a set speed. Stop-and-go marries camera and radar, so the Nautilus can sense and adjust to the pace of nearby cars.61
 Stop-and-go allows the vehicle to come to a complete stop and restart when traffic begins to move.* Plus, Lane Centering uses data from the forward-looking radar and camera to provide continuous steering support to help keep the vehicle centered in the lane.

TITLE: ELECTRIC POWER-ASSISTED STEERING (EPAS)
DESCRIPTION: Electric power assisted steering (EPAS) provides an easy, fluid steering feel at low speeds and a more firm and controlled feel at higher speeds. The system constantly monitors and detects changing road conditions and compensates for road surface irregularities.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: A suite of sensors monitors and adjusts the available adaptive suspension. Plus, you can select the operating mode — Comfort, Normal or Sport — that suits the driving experience you prefer, from exceptional ride quality to a spirited, sporty feel.

TITLE: ACTIVE NOISE CONTROL (ANC)
DESCRIPTION: Active noise control heightens overall cabin sound quality by reducing unwanted engine noise while enhancing desired sound to help provide a pleasant driving experience. The system monitors the sound profile and then creates an opposing sound wave. When the opposing wave meets the original sound wave, they cancel each other out.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT AWD
DESCRIPTION: Available Intelligent AWD uses sensors to constantly monitor traction. It delivers torque to the front and rear wheels to enhance handling and maximize grip, typically before wheelslip can even occur.

TITLE: AUTO HOLD
DESCRIPTION: Auto Hold offers relief when you come to stop signs, long traffic signals and other braking situations. When the driver stops the vehicle using the brake pedal, the system will hold and then release the brakes when the accelerator is pushed.

TITLE: FULL LED MULTI-PROJECTOR HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: The full LED Multi-Projector headlamps provide a broad field of light helping to give the driver a wide field of awareness of what lies ahead. The independent lenses can change position to widen or narrow the path of light in the direction in which the vehicle is traveling.

TITLE: LINCOLN CO-PILOT360™
DESCRIPTION:
The Nautilus includes a suite of our most advanced technology 
ever so that you can start your journey with confidence.

TITLE: BLIS® WITH CROSS-TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: BLIS (Blind Spot Information System) with cross-traffic alert61 helps warn you of vehicles you might otherwise miss. BLIS uses radar in the rear quarter panels to identify a vehicle entering your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the sideview mirror. Cross-traffic alert also uses radar to detect vehicles approaching from either side when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or your driveway. If it detects a vehicle approaching from up to 15 yards away, it sends an audible warning, a visual display in the sideview mirror and a signal in the message center.

TITLE: REAR BACKUP CAMERA WITH REAR CAMERA WASH*
DESCRIPTION: The rear view camera takes the guess work out of knowing what is behind your vehicle. Should the camera lens become dirty, cleaning it is as simple as activating the rear camera wash, making what’s behind you clear as day.

TITLE: AUTO EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Pre-collision assist with forward collision warning and Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB)61 can potentially help avoid or lessen the severity of a traffic accident. A vehicle with AEB supports the driver by helping avoid or lessen the severity of front crashes with another vehicle in certain situations. Using radar and camera technology to scan the roadway ahead, if the system detects another vehicle, it can provide a collision warning and then automatically apply the brakes if the driver has not taken corrective action.

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: The Lane-Keeping System61 uses a camera mounted behind the windshield’s rearview mirror to monitor road lane markings and detect unintentional drifting toward the outside of a lane. If the camera detects an impending drift, the system will use steering and the instrument cluster display to alert and/or aid the driver to say in the lane.

TITLE: AUTOMATIC HIGH BEAMS
DESCRIPTION: In low light situations, automatic high beams amplify the amount of light emitted from your headlamps to give you a better view of what lies ahead.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL WITH STOP-AND-GO AND LANE CENTERING
DESCRIPTION:
Adaptive cruise control61
 works like traditional cruise control. However, the system can automatically brake and accelerate to keep you at your set speed or follow with the pace of traffic when speeds are below what you set. Plus, Lane Centering uses data from the forward-looking radar and camera to provide continuous steering support to help keep the vehicle centered in the lane.

TITLE: ENHANCED ACTIVE PARK ASSIST
DESCRIPTION:
Available enhanced active park assist makes getting in or out of tight parking spaces easy.61
 Ultrasonic sensors can locate an available spot and help the vehicle steer into place. Perpendicular park assist helps you guide the vehicle into perpendicular spots when you’re in Reverse, while park out assist aids in getting out of tight parallel parking spots. Meanwhile, you control the shifter buttons, brake and accelerator for seamless positioning.

TITLE: 12.3" LCD DRIVER INFORMATION SCREEN
DESCRIPTION: This vivid screen puts a wealth of control* at your fingertips. Simple setting controls let you customize what is displayed including adaptive cruise control warnings, turn-by-turn navigation directions and more.

TITLE: REVEL® AUDIO SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: The available Revel Audio System®* aims to meticulously reproduce the live-music experience right in the comfort of your vehicle. Many innovative features were specifically curated with the Lincoln Nautilus in mind, adding up to a truly awe-inspiring performance every time. Systems include the 13-speaker Revel Audio System* and the 19-speaker Revel Ultima® System plus three unique sound modes–Stereo, Audience and Onstage. Personalize your listening experience even further with a year-long membership to TIDAL®**, the high-fidelity music streaming service that places a library of over sixty million songs at your fingertips, complimentary with the purchase or lease of any new 2019 Lincoln Nautilus.

TITLE: LINCOLN + ALEXA*
DESCRIPTION:
The Lincoln Motor Company and Amazon have collaborated to bring you many familiar in-home uses of Alexa to your Lincoln vehicle. By using SYNC® 312 AppLink,®12 you can ask to hear news stories and play music, add things to your Amazon shopping list, update personal calendars and use voice controls to operate smart home devices, including your garage door, thermostats, lighting and more. Click here
 to discover the full range of capabilities.

TITLE: WAZE VIA SYNC®3 APPLINK®
DESCRIPTION: With the SYNC 3 Applink you can connect to your phone and utilize the Waze App.* Turn-by-turn directions, caution alerts, faster routes and much more are delivered on the center console, making for less distracted driving.

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING
DESCRIPTION: Get a charge out of simply setting something down. The Lincoln Nautilus features a standard wireless charger located in the front center media bin that charges compatible phones.*

TITLE: SYNC® 3
DESCRIPTION: Capable of understanding voice commands, SYNC 3 is our latest in voice-activated technology.12 And with its easy-to-use design, interface and features, it’s definitely worth talking about. Experience voice-activated technology. SYNC.® Say the word.®

TITLE: NAVIGATION
DESCRIPTION: With available navigation with SiriusXM® Traffic and Travel Link,® SYNC® 3 features easy destination entry. It’s easy to locate that hard-to-find Thai restaurant, the nearest ATM or a highly rated coffee shop. Plus, responsive, adaptive search results are based upon your preferences. With SYNC 3, you can easily get to your destination with audible turn-by-turn navigation, along with continuously updated directions, weather information, traffic delays, alternate route suggestions and more.22

TITLE: SAFETY
DESCRIPTION: Whether sitting still or on the move, the Lincoln Nautilus has you covered with many safety features. The available Enhanced Security Package includes an interior motion sensor that detects movement inside the car and an inclination motion sensor that detects changes in the vehicle’s angle (such as during towing and jacking). The standard Personal Safety System includes dual-stage front airbags,* front safety belt pretensioners and safety belt energy-management retractors, a crash severity sensor, driver’s seat position sensor, restraint control module, Front-Passenger Sensing System and front safety belt usage sensors.

TITLE: LINCOLN CONNECT
DESCRIPTION: Expand your capabilities with Lincoln Connect.* An embedded modem with 4G Wi-Fi capability, standard in most 2018 and newer Lincoln vehicles, offers impressive connectivity. Plus, the embedded modem gives the Lincoln Way™ app greater functionality and remote control of your vehicle.

TITLE: 360 DEGREE CAMERA*
DESCRIPTION:
Upgrade your field of vision from every angle. Four cameras on the front, rear and sides merge to provide a bird’s-eye view around the vehicle.61
 You’ll be better able to see down sidewalks while backing up and navigating tight parking spots. Plus, a 180-degree split-view camera located in the vehicle’s grille helps boost visibility in cross-traffic situations, intersections and seeing around parked cars.

TITLE: THE LINCOLN WAY™ APP
DESCRIPTION:
Stay connected to your vehicle — and the features and benefits of Lincoln ownership — with the Lincoln Way app.1
Unlock and start your Lincoln remotely.2
Get Roadside Assistance and personalized customer service with the Lincoln Concierge. And schedule complimentary Lincoln Pickup & Delivery3
when your vehicle needs service. The future of driving is at hand. Download the Lincoln Way app now — and see where the road takes you.

TITLE: THE LINCOLN EMBRACE
DESCRIPTION: Design that reveals itself as you draw near. The Lincoln Embrace warmly welcomes you as you approach your Lincoln Nautilus.

TITLE: AMBIENT LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: Inside the Lincoln Nautilus available ambient lighting gently glows, illuminating the entire cabin as you approach. Select from seven distinct colors to either complement your mood or change it.

TITLE: AUTO-FOLDING SIDEVIEW MIRRORS
DESCRIPTION: When you leave your Lincoln Nautilus and lock the doors, the mirrors automatically fold in, helping to keep them protected from nicks, dings and scrapes. When you are back in the vehicle with your key fob and close the door, the mirrors automatically fold out.

TITLE: EXTERIOR LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: It lights up almost as much as you do. As you approach the Lincoln Nautilus, an elegant sequence of available lighting animates. In addition, a Lincoln logo welcome mat is projected on the ground, welcoming you back.

TITLE: PANORAMIC VISTA ROOF®
DESCRIPTION: It’s easy to breathe in the beauty of the outside world. The available panoramic Vista Roof spans both rows of seating, allowing for abundant sunshine and refreshing breezes. The front roof panel is powered for easy opening and closing, and includes a power sunshade to help keep the interior cool and comfortable on warmer days. Elevate your journey and take in the scenery.

TITLE: HANDS-FREE POWER LIFTGATE
DESCRIPTION: Access the cargo area even with your hands full. With the Lincoln Nautilus key fob snug in a pocket or purse, simply kick your foot under the rear bumper. The standard hands-free liftgate effortlessly opens to reveal the rear cargo area. Press a button on the liftgate or kick your foot under the rear bumper and the liftgate smoothly closes.

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING
DESCRIPTION: Get a charge out of simply setting something down. The Lincoln Nautilus features a standard wireless charger located in the front center media bin that wirelessly charges compatible phones.*

TITLE: HEATED AND VENTILATED FRONT SEATS
DESCRIPTION: So comfortable, you may not want the trip to end. Available leather-trimmed front seats that are heated and ventilated for cooling were designed to ensure a luxurious driving experience. Standard Comfort power front seats with lumbar support and memory settings for three drivers as well as available Ultra-Comfort front seats further enhance the ride.

TITLE: UNIQUE WOOD TRIM
DESCRIPTION: Create an inviting, strikingly luxe environment when you opt for the available genuine wood trim in high-gloss Brown Swirl Walnut, Espresso Ash Swirl open-pore wood or Gray Ash Swirl. These unique trims further embellish the center console, steering wheel and door appliqués.

TITLE: BRIDGE OF WEIR™ LEATHER
DESCRIPTION: Experience seating draped in luxury. Bridge of Weir Deepsoft™ leather-trimmed seats* feature 100 percent unembossed leather, highlighting its natural beauty and making each seating surface unique. The chromium-free, organic tanning method produces environmentally sustainable byproducts and creates one of the finest leathers available on vehicles today.

TITLE: 12.3” INSTRUMENT CLUSTER
DESCRIPTION: This vivid screen puts a wealth of control at your fingertips. Simple to use controls allow you to customize what is displayed including Adaptive Cruise Control warnings, turn-by-turn navigation directions and more.

TITLE: ULTRA-COMFORT SEATS WITH ACTIVE MOTION®
DESCRIPTION: Available Ultra-Comfort front seats with Active Motion offer a wide range of adjustability. With 11 independent air cushions, seven of which offer massage, these seats can help decrease muscle fatigue, aches and pains to help keep your focus where it should be—on the road ahead.

TITLE: STUNNING WHEEL LINEUP
DESCRIPTION:
The 2019 Lincoln Nautilus features a number of exciting wheel options including:

 18-inch warm alloy painted aluminum

 18-inch premium painted bright machined aluminum

 20-inch premium painted bright machined aluminum

 20-inch premium painted ultra-bright machined aluminum

 21-inch premium painted ultra-bright machined aluminum

TITLE: A SCULPTED EXTERIOR
DESCRIPTION: By applying sweeping lines and elegant contours, our designers created the 2019 Lincoln Nautilus to make every drive a liberating experience. The exterior’s unique details convey a dynamic elegance, while the Lincoln signature grille flows seamlessly into the headlamps and highlight the vehicle’s bold curves.

TITLE: LINCOLN BLACK LABEL
DESCRIPTION: Elevate your Lincoln experience. With a curated collection of interior themes meticulously brought to life in high-end materials and a host of membership privileges, Lincoln Black Label* engages the senses and imagination, creating the ultimate in Lincoln luxury, comfort and service.

TITLE: TWIN-SCROLL TURBOCHARGED 2.3L ENGINE*
DESCRIPTION: The MKC can be equipped with a twin-scroll turbocharged 2.3L engine, available in AWD, that delivers 285 horsepower and 305 lb.-ft. of torque.* Power is delivered by three brilliant technologies—turbocharging, direct injection and twin independent variable camshaft timing (Ti-VCT). The 2.3L engine empowers MKC to offer a towing capacity of 3,000 lbs. when properly equipped.

TITLE: TURBOCHARGED I-4 2.0L ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: At the heart of the MKC lies a responsive 245-horsepower* turbocharged I-4 2.0L engine, available in both FWD and AWD, that uses three technologies—the boost of turbocharging, the precision of direct injection and the sophistication of twin independent variable camshaft timing (Ti-VCT). The result is an MKC powertrain that’s highly intelligent and powerful.

TITLE: SIX-SPEED SELECTSHIFT®
DESCRIPTION: The six-speed SelectShift automatic transmission offers the control of a stick shift with the convenience of an automatic. The wheel-mounted paddle shifters on the 2019 Lincoln MKC let you shift gears quickly without taking your hands off the steering wheel. Or, simply relax and let the automatic mode glide efficiently through all six speeds.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION:
Available driver-activated adaptive cruise control (ACC)61 

operates just like normal cruise control, with one exception—its sensors can detect traffic slowing ahead and automatically slow your car to maintain the preset distance you’ve set. When traffic has cleared, your car resumes the set speed. Forward collision warning with brake support61 
included with ACC, can alert you if it senses a potential collision with the car in front of you. A pulsing light, which simulates brake lights, flashes on the windshield. If you don’t react immediately, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT ALL-WHEEL DRIVE (AWD)
DESCRIPTION: Available Intelligent AWD uses sensors to constantly monitor traction. It balances torque between the front and rear wheels to enhance handling and maximize traction, typically before wheelslip can even occur.

TITLE: ACTIVE NOISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Active noise control heightens overall cabin sound quality by reducing unwanted noise while enhancing desired sound to help provide a pleasant driving experience. Microphones monitor the sound profile of the cabin, which is then replicated and inverted to create an opposing acoustic wave through the speakers. When the opposing wave meets the original sound wave, they cancel each other out.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE SUSPENSION*
DESCRIPTION: A suite of sensors continuously monitors and adjusts the suspension. The sensors also detect body movement, along with steering and braking dynamics, in milliseconds, faster than you can blink. Select the operating mode—Comfort, Normal or Sport—that suits the driving experience you prefer, from exceptional ride quality to a spirited, sporty feel.

TITLE: ELECTRIC POWER-ASSISTED STEERING (EPAS)
DESCRIPTION: EPAS provides an easy, fluid steering feel at low speeds and a firmer, more controlled feel at higher speeds. And that’s not all. It also constantly adapts to changing road conditions and compensates for surface irregularities.

TITLE:
AdvanceTrac®
 with Roll Stability Control™
DESCRIPTION:
This electronic stability system provides enhanced control in slick conditions such as snow, rain or gravel. Roll Stability Control (RSC®
)* provides enhanced side-slip control and delivers electronic vehicle rollover stability. RSC utilizes gyroscopic sensors to monitor roll rate and vehicle roll motion at least 100 times per second. This helps determine when and how it will apply the brakes to help keep all four wheels firmly planted.

TITLE: ENHANCED THX® II CERTIFIED AUDIO SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: The available enhanced THX II Certified Audio System features a range of innovations in sound technology from the acoustical minds at THX. It puts out 700 watts of power and features 14 strategically placed speakers—including three two-way front-slot speakers, two individual rear-door tweeters to precisely reproduce your music’s high notes, and two three-inch rear-mounted speakers to envelop MKC passengers in a truly immersive sound experience. And innovations such as distributed bass technology help ensure that low notes are being evenly dispersed throughout the cabin.

TITLE: SYNC®3 WITH WAZE AND LINCOLN+ALEXA INTEGRATION
DESCRIPTION: Sync® 3 is our easy-to-use, responsive voice-activated technology. Discover the system’s quick reactions to your conversational voice commands. Experience the smartphone-like touchscreen with impressive responsiveness. Enjoy your favorite apps like Waze and Lincoln+Alexa fully integrated. You’ll also find a sleek, user-friendly interface to help you connect to and control your smartphone. Locate your favorite restaurants with simple destination entry via the optional navigation. Sync® 3 is fast, smart and easy to use.

TITLE: SYNC® 3 PLUS APPLE CARPLAY™ COMPATIBILITY53
DESCRIPTION: SYNC® 3 12 can bring the power of Apple CarPlay to your Lincoln. You can use Siri® to interact with your iPhone®. Make calls, return missed calls and listen to voice mail, as well as send, read and reply to text messages, and even access your favorite songs and playlists. Apple Maps provides convenient turn-by-turn directions, traffic conditions and estimated travel time. 53

TITLE: NAVIGATION SYSTEM WITH SIRIUSXM TRAFFIC & TRAVEL LINK®
DESCRIPTION: The available Navigation System includes a six-year prepaid SiriusXM Traffic and Travel Link subscription that offers detailed traffic and weather information, gas station locations and fuel prices, sports scores and schedules, and movie theater locations with show listings and times.22

TITLE: ANDROID AUTO™
DESCRIPTION: With Android Auto you can talk to Google™ to interact with your smartphone while keeping your eyes on the road and hands on the wheel. Make calls, return missed calls and listen to voicemail, as well as send, read and reply to text messages and access your favorite music through your favorite apps. Google Maps™ provides voice-guided navigation, live traffic information and estimated travel time. You can also connect to Google Now and Google Music.161

TITLE: LINCOLN + ALEXA*
DESCRIPTION:
The Lincoln Motor Company and Amazon have collaborated to bring you many familiar in-home uses of Alexa to your Lincoln vehicle. By using SYNC®
 312
 AppLink®
,12

  you can request to hear news stories and play music, add things to your Amazon shopping list, update personal calendars and use voice controls to operate smart home devices, including your garage door, thermostats, lighting and more. Click here
 to discover the full range of capabilities.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION:
Available driver-activated adaptive cruise control (ACC)61
 operates just like normal cruise control, with one exception—its sensors can detect traffic slowing ahead and automatically slow your car to maintain the preset distance you’ve set. When traffic has cleared, your car resumes the set speed. Forward collision warning with brake support, included with ACC, can alert you if it senses a potential collision with the car in front of you. A pulsing light, which simulates brake lights, flashes on the windshield. If you don’t react immediately, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake.

TITLE: ACTIVE PARK ASSIST WITH PARK OUT ASSIST
DESCRIPTION: Available active park assist61 is one of the many driver-assist technologies in the Lincoln MKC. Active park assist uses ultrasonic sensors to help take the guesswork out of parallel parking. Simply press a button and the sensors will locate a suitable parking space. Active park assist operates the steering wheel, while you stay in control of accelerating, braking and shifting. And just as active park assist helps guide your vehicle into a spot, park out assist uses the same sensors to help you get out of it.

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM*
DESCRIPTION: It happens to the best of drivers—unintentionally drifting out of the driving lane. That’s when you’ll appreciate the available Lane-Keeping System.61 ** When activated, it can detect when your car is drifting out of its lane and can warn you through a subtle vibration in the steering wheel. Additional settings allow the system to apply steering torque that helps you to steer back to the correct path.

TITLE: AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Forward collision warning with brake support can alert you if it senses a potential collision with the car in front of you. A red light, which simulates brake lights, flashes on the windshield. If you don’t react immediately, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake.

TITLE: BLIS® WITH CROSS-TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Available BLIS (Blind Spot Information System) with cross-traffic alert61 helps warn you of vehicles you might otherwise miss. BLIS uses radar in the rear quarter panels to identify a vehicle entering your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the sideview mirror. Cross-traffic alert also uses radar to detect vehicles approaching from either side when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or your driveway. If it detects a vehicle approaching from up to 15 yards away, it sends an audible warning, a visual display in the sideview mirror and a signal in the message center.

TITLE: STANDARD REAR VIEW CAMERA
DESCRIPTION: Activated when you shift into Reverse, the rear view camera61 can show you certain objects that are behind your vehicle. It can also be a helpful assistant when you’re connecting a trailer. When in Reverse, a video image is displayed on the central screen, with red, yellow and green guidelines providing an easy reference for how far an object is behind you.

TITLE: LED HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Signature LED accents frame the sculpted LED headlamps that create a powerful path of light.

TITLE: LINCOLN DRIVE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Lincoln Drive Control, a collection of ride-enhancing technologies includes adaptive suspension which allows you to select from one of the three available modes—Normal, Sport or Comfort—to suit your mood. Once a mode is selected, the adaptive suspension utilizes an array of sensors to monitor and adjust itself to offer the optimal ride based on your choice.

TITLE: THE LINCOLN EMBRACE
DESCRIPTION: You’ve arrived and your MKC knows it. When it senses your approach, a suite of features activates as if to say both “Welcome home” and “Where to next?”

TITLE: AUTOFOLD POWER SIDEVIEW MIRRORS
DESCRIPTION: The 2019 MKC features available autofold power sideview mirrors. These mirrors unfold when you get into the MKC and fold in after you park and lock the doors. There is also a switch on the driver’s door that folds the mirrors toward the vehicle to help avoid hitting an object while you’re parking.

TITLE: AMBIENT LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: Select a hue to match your mood. Available ambient lighting provides seven color choices. Light emits from the front-console cupholders, door-release handles, front and rear footwells and front-door storage pockets.

TITLE: APPROACH DETECTION
DESCRIPTION: Once parked, your MKC awaits your return. As you approach with your key fob in your hand, purse or pocket the vehicle senses your approach (up to eight feet away) and exterior lighting brightens. Doorhandle pockets glow with soft lighting tuned to complement the vehicle’s color. A Lincoln logo welcome mat illuminates the entrance in front of both the driver and passenger doors. Once you’re in the car, available ambient cabin lighting glows warmly.

TITLE: PANORAMIC VISTA ROOF®
DESCRIPTION: The available panoramic Vista Roof provides both the first- and second-row passengers with an expansive view. The panoramic Vista Roof comes with a power sunshade to help keep your vehicle cool when the temperature heats up.

TITLE: HANDS-FREE LIFTGATE
DESCRIPTION: With the MKC key fob in your pocket or purse, simply kick your foot under the rear bumper and the available hands-free liftgate will effortlessly glide open to reveal the rear cargo area. Press a button on the liftgate or kick your foot under the rear bumper again and the liftgate closes smoothly.

TITLE: LEATHER-WRAPPED STEERING WHEEL
DESCRIPTION: The steering wheel is wrapped in available hand-stitched Wollsdorf leather hailing from the Alpine region of central Europe. It flawlessly complements the craftsmanship and comfort of the MKC interior.

TITLE: BRIDGE OF WEIR™ LEATHER
DESCRIPTION: The available Bridge of Weir Deepsoft™ leather-trimmed heated front bucket seats were created specifically for Lincoln. This leather goes through a 16-hour softening process, considerably longer than those used for most automotive leathers.

TITLE: PEACEFUL SPACE
DESCRIPTION: Interior noise is greatly diminished with active noise control, felt-like wheel wells, pedestal-style doormounted mirrors that are designed to minimize wind noise, and specially engineered acoustic-laminate front door glass that reduces road noise.

TITLE: HEATED AND COOLED FRONT SEATS*
DESCRIPTION: In addition to soothing-to-the-touch Bridge of Weir DeepsoftTM leather, the driver and front-passenger seats come with standard heating and available cooling—making the interior as rejuvenating as it is inviting.

TITLE: CLIMATE PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION: The available Climate Package makes the interior even more inviting while helping to manage the exterior elements. The package includes heated rear outboard seats, a heated steering wheel, auto high-beam headlamps, rain-sensing wipers and a windshield wiper de-icer.

TITLE: WHEEL OPTIONS
DESCRIPTION:
For the 2019 model year, the Lincoln MKC offers a number of exciting and eye-catching wheel options. Standard and available options include:

• 18-inch painted aluminum (standard)

• 18-inch painted aluminum (standard on Select)

• 18-inch machined aluminum with premium painted pockets (standard on Reserve)

• 19-inch machined aluminum with premium painted pockets (optional on Reserve model FWD)

• 19-inch 5-spoke premium painted aluminum (optional on Reserve AWD)

• 20-inch Ultra-bright-machined aluminum with Ebony-painted pockets (optional on reserve AWD)

TITLE: A SCULPTED EXTERIOR
DESCRIPTION: The MKC blends the best traits of a sport crossover with the refinement of a luxury sedan. It begins with the redesigned Lincoln signature grille framing dramatic HID headlamps with signature LED accents. Crisp lines stretch tautly across the sculpted body. The low roof and high beltline evoke an athletic nature.

TITLE: LINCOLN BLACK LABEL*
DESCRIPTION: Elevate your Lincoln experience. Featuring a curated collection of interior themes meticulously brought to life in rare, high-end materials and a host of membership privileges, Lincoln Black Label engages the senses and imagination, representing the ultimate in luxury, comfort and service.

TITLE: TWIN-TURBOCHARGED 3.0-LITER V6 ENGINE WITH 400 HP
DESCRIPTION: Outer beauty. Inner strength. The Lincoln Motor Company has gone to extraordinary lengths to give the exterior of the 2019 MKZ an exceptional level of grace and elegance. An equal amount of effort has been applied to develop and harness the capabilities of an available Twin-Turbocharged 3.0L V6 engine. This engine delivers 400 horsepower and 400 lb.- ft. of torque,* making the 2019 Lincoln MKZ one of the most powerful and compelling Lincoln vehicles to ever take to the road. Plus, Dynamic Torque Vectoring* makes every turn crisp and precise.

TITLE: MKZ HYBRID
DESCRIPTION: The similarities are surprising. The shared features between the MKZ Hybrid and its gas counterpart go well beyond the exterior. Designers and engineers worked hand in hand to deliver a hybrid powertrain that has an EPA-estimated rating of 41 miles to the gallon in the city,* while keeping almost every surface, button, knob and interior finish exactly the same. Plus, the Lincoln MKZ Hybrid is the only hybrid in its class with the same starting price as its gas-powered Reserve model counterpart.**

TITLE: AVAILABLE ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln MKZ offers all-wheel drive (AWD) with both the Turbocharged 2.0L I-4 and Twin-Turbocharged 3.0L V6 engines. AWD enhances handling and maximizes traction by delivering torque to the front and rear wheels. Plus, when AWD is added to the 3.0L engine, it produces 400 horsepower and offers Dynamic Torque Vectoring for a precise steering feel.*

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL WITH STOP-AND-GO
DESCRIPTION:
Engage and enjoy. The evolution of available adaptive cruise control61
 with stop-and-go capability offers an enjoyable and confident drive. When the MKZ is in adaptive cruise mode, a radar scans the road ahead and detects slower traffic ahead. The MKZ can then automatically brake and accelerate to keep you at your set speed or follow at a preset distance with the pace of traffic when speeds are below your set speed. With the addition of stop-and-go, the feature can bring your vehicle to a complete stop in stopped traffic and restart it as traffic begins to move.*

TITLE: ACTIVE NOISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Active noise control heightens overall cabin sound quality by reducing unwanted noise while enhancing sound that is desired. Microphones monitor the sound profile of the cabin, which is then inverted by a signal processor to create an opposing acoustic wave through the speakers. When the opposing wave meets the original sound wave, they cancel each other out, providing a more pleasant driving experience.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: The adaptive suspension in the Lincoln MKZ uses an available suite of sensors to monitor and adjust your ride experience. Plus, you can select the operating mode—Comfort, Normal or Sport—that suits the driving experience you prefer, from exceptional ride quality to a spirited, sporty feel.

TITLE: ELECTRIC POWER-ASSISTED STEERING (EPAS)
DESCRIPTION: Electric Power-Assisted Steering (EPAS) provides an easy, fluid steering feel at low speeds and a firmer, more controlled feel at higher speeds. It also continuously adapts to changing road conditions and compensates for surface irregularities.

TITLE: Lincoln Co-Pilot360™
DESCRIPTION: The MKZ includes a suite of our most advanced technology ever so that you can start your journey with confidence.

TITLE: Standard Driver-Assist Features
DESCRIPTION: Lincoln Co-Pilot360™ is the most comprehensive collection of standard driver-assist features61 ever offered by Lincoln. Together these features support you on your journey by helping to relieve stress and offering greater peace of mind.

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System*
DESCRIPTION: The Lane-Keeping System61 uses a camera mounted behind the windshield’s rearview mirror to monitor road lane markings and detect unintentional drifting toward the outside of a lane. If the rear view camera detects an impending drift, the system will use the steering wheel and the instrument cluster display to warn you.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Experience headlamps designed for the curves ahead. To enjoy those drives at night, the adaptive HID and available LED headlamps turn in tandem with the steering wheel to help drivers see around corners.

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH PEDESTRIAN DETECTION
DESCRIPTION: For the road ahead. Pre-collision assist with Automatic Emergency Braking61 is our next generation of driver-assist technology.* This feature uses radar and camera technology to scan the roadway ahead and, if another vehicle or pedestrian is detected, provides a warning to the driver. If the driver does not respond in time, the system can automatically recharge the brakes to provide full responsiveness should the driver not respond.

TITLE: BLIND SPOT DETECTION
DESCRIPTION: Blind Spot Detection helps make driving more convenient than one may expect. It uses radar to detect a vehicle in your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the appropriate exterior mirror. Cross-traffic alert also uses radar to watch for traffic behind your vehicle as you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway. If sensors detect a vehicle approaching from up to 15 yards away, you will be audibly and visually alerted.

TITLE: THE LINCOLN WAY™ APP
DESCRIPTION:
Stay connected to your vehicle—and the features and benefits of Lincoln ownership—with the Lincoln Way app.1
Unlock and start your Lincoln remotely with Lincoln Connect.™2
Get Roadside Assistance3
and personalized customer service with the Lincoln Concierge. And schedule complimentary Lincoln Pickup & Delivery™4
when your vehicle needs service. The future of driving is at hand. Download the Lincoln Way app now — and see where the road takes you.

TITLE: ENHANCED ACTIVE PARK ASSIST
DESCRIPTION:
Easy in. Easy out. Available enhanced active park assist61
 helps make getting in or out of tight parking spaces easier than ever. Ultrasonic sensors can locate an available spot and, while the driver controls the shifter buttons, brake and accelerator, the vehicle steers itself into place. Reverse perpendicular parking guides the vehicle into perpendicular spots, while park out assist aids in getting out of tight parallel parking spots.

TITLE: REVEL® AUDIO
DESCRIPTION: Bring every note to life with the performance, authenticity and craftsmanship of Revel®* Audio. The standard 14-speaker Revel Audio System and available 20-speaker Revel Ultima® System in the MKZ immerses you in sound, and Lincoln allows you to make the most of your listening experience with a year-long membership to TIDAL®**, the high-fidelity music streaming service that places over sixty million songs at your fingertips, complimentary with the purchase or lease of any new 2019 Lincoln MKZ.

TITLE: APPLE CARPLAY™
DESCRIPTION: SYNC 327 can bring the power of Apple CarPlay compatibility to your Lincoln. You can use Siri® to interact with your iPhone.® Make calls, return missed calls and listen to voicemail, as well as send, read and reply to text messages, and even access your favorite songs and playlists. Apple Maps provides convenient turn-by-turn directions, traffic conditions and estimated travel time.53

TITLE: SYNC® 3
DESCRIPTION: Say hello to SYNC 3. In fact, you can say quite a few things. Capable of understanding voice commands, SYNC 3 is our latest voice-activated technology.12 And with its easy-to-use design, interface and features, it’s definitely worth talking about. Experience voice-activated technology. SYNC.® Say the Word.® Learn More.

TITLE: ANDROID AUTO™
DESCRIPTION: SYNC® 327  can bring the power of Android Auto compatibility to your Lincoln. You can talk to Google™ to interact with your smartphone while keeping your eyes on the road and hands on the wheel. Make calls, return missed calls and listen to voicemail, as well as send, read and reply to text messages and access your favorite music through your favorite apps. Google Maps™ provides voice-guided navigation, live traffic information and estimated travel time. You can also connect to Google Now and Google Music.161

TITLE: LINCOLN + ALEXA*
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln Motor Company and Amazon have collaborated to bring you many familiar in-home uses of Alexa to your Lincoln vehicle. By using SYNC® 312 AppLink,®12 you can request to hear news stories and play music, add things to your Amazon shopping list, updated personal calendars and use voice controls to operate smart home devices, including your garage door, thermostats, lighting and more. Click here to discover the full range of capabilities.

TITLE: WAZE VIA SYNC®3 APPLINK*
DESCRIPTION: Utilize the Waze app through the SYNC 3 AppLink. Connect to your phone for turn-by-turn directions, caution alerts, faster routes and much more are delivered on the center console, making for less distracted driving.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL WITH STOP-AND-GO
DESCRIPTION:
Engage and enjoy. The evolution of available adaptive cruise control61
 with stop-and-go capability offers an enjoyable and confident drive. When the MKZ is in adaptive cruise mode, a radar scans the road ahead and detects slower traffic ahead. The MKZ can then automatically brake and accelerate to keep you at your set speed or follow at a preset distance with the pace of traffic when speeds are below your set speed. With the addition of stop-and-go, the feature can bring your vehicle to a complete stop in stopped traffic and restart it as traffic begins to move.*

TITLE: LINCOLN CONNECT™
DESCRIPTION: With Lincoln Connect, Lincoln owners and passengers can enjoy an in-vehicle Wi-Fi hotspot. It features a 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot, powered by AT&T. Up to 10 devices can connect at once, and you can use the Lincoln Way™ app to keep track of your Wi-Fi data usage. You can access the hotspot up to 50 feet outside the vehicle. Now you can stay connected, even as you roam the highways.*

TITLE: A LOOK OF DISTINCTION.
DESCRIPTION: Design teams distinctly crafted the Lincoln MKZ to offer more sleek and elegant lines. The front end establishes a strong sense of power and confidence without being overly aggressive. With one glimpse, it’s easy to see that the Lincoln MKZ calls out to be driven.

TITLE: INTERIOR TOUCHES
DESCRIPTION: While the engine of the Lincoln MKZ produces plenty of power, the interior styling makes a powerful statement of its own. Rich Ebony, Cappucino or Terracotta Bridge of Weir™ leathers invite you in while selected open-pore hardwood appliqués, including Brown Swirl Walnut and Espresso Ash Swirl unify interior surfaces. Attentive stitchwork, insightful storage space and intuitive technology interfaces makes attention to detail attention-worthy.

TITLE: EXTERIOR ACCENTS
DESCRIPTION: LED accent lighting, the Lincoln signature grille and chrome accents unify to express the language of design as it is expressed through the Lincoln MKZ.

TITLE: LINCOLN SIGNATURE GRILLE
DESCRIPTION: A signature statement. The Lincoln Star logo repeated in the one-piece Lincoln signature grille exudes a quiet sense of confidence. The Lincoln Star emblem is poised on a slight upward angle as if in preparation to launch itself on a thrilling and luxurious journey.

TITLE: WHEEL LINEUP
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln MKZ features a number of standard and available wheel options. 19-inch 7 spoke machined-aluminum wheels and premium painted pockets are standard on reserve II models. 19-inch 10 spoke machined-aluminum wheels with premium painted pockets are optional on reserve I models.

TITLE: RETRACTABLE PANORAMIC GLASS ROOF*
DESCRIPTION: Alter your outlook with the simple press of a button. The fully retractable panoramic glass roof opens up new worlds and new experiences. With easy-to-use push-button activation, a single pane of glass slides back to create the largest opening among sedans.**

TITLE: THE LINCOLN EMBRACE
DESCRIPTION:
You’ve arrived and your MKZ can tell. When it senses your approach, a suite of features activates as if

to say, “Welcome home” and “Where to next?”

TITLE: APPROACH DETECTION
DESCRIPTION: Experience approachable luxury, quite literally. With approach detection, the 2019 Lincoln MKZ lights the way. When approaching with keys in hand, purse or pocket, your MKZ detects you, triggering an engaging and welcoming experience including daytime running lights and fog lamps illuminating in a visually dazzling array.

TITLE: AMBIENT LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: Inside the Lincoln MKZ, available ambient lighting gently glows, illuminating the entire cabin as you enter. Select from seven unique colors to either capture your mood or to change it.

TITLE: LINCOLN WELCOME MAT
DESCRIPTION: As you approach the Lincoln MKZ, an elegant sequence of lighting animates by illuminating front and rear lights. In addition, a Lincoln logo welcome mat is projected on the ground, welcoming you back.

TITLE:
BRIDGE OF WEIRTM
 LEATHER-TRIMMED SEATS
DESCRIPTION: Luxury is in the fingertips of the beholder. Individual and unique, Bridge of Weir leather-trimmed seats* offer a striking presentation of the beautiful material that will touch you in more ways than one.

DESCRIPTION: The similarities are surprising. The shared features between the MKZ Hybrid and its gas counterpart go well beyond the exterior.
